Generation tools

⚭ ⚠️ Work in progress ⚠️

⚭

When you execute a Nwayo generation task via the CLI, the output will be generated under the path set in the yaml bundle config.

⚭ Linters

⚭ File Compilation

The SCSS files will be compiled to css files according to the configurations. The configurations can be set for each bundle.
